gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Rockets 136, Pistons 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Rockets defeated the Pistons, 136-113. Alperen Sengun recorded a team-high 26 points and nine assists for the Rockets, while Jalen Green added 22 points, five rebounds, and five  3PM in the victory. Alec Burks tallied 21 points and three 3PM for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Rockets snap a 3-game losing streak as they improve to 16-15 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 3-30.
